title: Understanding perinatal women's preferences for mental health apps: A mixed methods study
details: D Dinkel, P Chaudhary, K Kupzyk, DJ Johnson… - Mental Health & Prevention, 2025
abstract: Introduction Perinatal mental health disorders impact 1 in 5 reproductive-aged women, affecting maternal and child health. Mobile apps may be a method of providing easily accessible mental health support including physical activity …
